About SyncUp

Plan together. Find Time. Stay organized.

Team Members

  • Drake Hoffman - Team Lead
  • William Thomsen - Developer
  • Ian Heathcote - Developer

Project Description

SyncUp addresses the challenge of scheduling conflicts when planning events or meeting. Whether coordinating with friends or colleagues, or app simplifies planning by identifying shared availability.

Objectives

  • Store and edit dates of important events or deadlines
  • Create and sync group calendars
  • Add timeframes for each day

Scope

This app includes:

  • Personal calendar editing and saving
  • Sharing/syncing with others
  • Categories: Work, School, Personal, etc.
  • Option to share full event content or just "busy" status

This app will never include:

  • GPS/location sharing
  • Messaging
  • LLMs

Proposed Solution

SyncUp is a simple calendar logging system that helps users create and manage events. By syncing group calendars, it enables collaboration planning. The web-based app uses a small database to track users and their groups, making it ideal for families, friend group, and small projects. With sqlite3, it also functions well as a personal calendar.

Technology Strack

  • ReactJS
  • NodeJS
  • Astro framework
  • sqlite3
